title: Little Lulu
overview: Lulu Moppet is a bright and active 7 year-old girl who lives in Peekskill. In a medium-sized home, Lulu is having fun all day with her parents. Lulu's friends are the timid young girl Annie Inch, the fat and friendly Tubby Tompkins, the rich sergeant Wilbur van Snobbe, and the fighting commoner Iggy (Annie's brother), An everyday comedic commoner where a variety of his friends come together and develop different turmoils.
